question: Which of the following tribal movements led by Rani Gaidinliu?
explanation: Heraka religious movement was launched by her cousin Haipou Jadonang initially to reform the Zealiangrong Naga communities. But later it turned into a political movement seeking to drive out the British from Manipur and the surrounding Naga areas. In this movement she was considered as incarnation of the goddess Cherachamdinliu.
